showerReviews.reviewText:
Lot full of dirt and  giant potholes.
Showers are old and if you want to use the restroom make sure to do before you take the shower because they don‚Äôt have a toilet inside the shower room
‚Ä¶ They ACCEPT My Rewards Cards & You can use your points to take a shower or whatever. ‚Ä¶
Definitely should've went by the reviews. Tried the showers and although it was good temperature, that was the only positive. Clogged up shower somewhere in the pipping

The smallest hole in the dirt Flying J I've ever stopped at in the country.  Wanted $3.64 for a regular size Txix!!! No thanks.  One shower 2 bathrooms. Very little of anything on a dirt lot. No restaurant.

‚Ä¶ A FLYING J TRUCK STOP... Its Dirty, Shady...Wanted to take a shower but after noticing how dirty the place is and worn out, I decided to walk to LOVES and pay for  shower even though I have enough points for shower at pilot or flying J... ‚Ä¶

Can‚Äôt use your shower credits here. Also everything in the store is over priced. Parking has no lighting, full of potholes and no lane markings. The only plus to this place is the friendly staff that‚Äôs why it‚Äôs a two star and not a one

Antiquated truck stop. 2 showers. No toilet in the shower rooms. Very small. Parking limited. The loves under construction will surely take away business. No real complaints from me though. I found parking and a shower. Fit the bill.

‚Ä¶ people. The lot is a dump and that puts it nicely. The showers, there are only 2, are clean but very small and do not have toilets inside the shower rooms. They only have two restrooms so you better hope to not have to go at a peak time.
In spite of its petiteness, the shower was refreshing and clean.

‚Ä¶ flying J name. It a run down little yard barn with old messed up pumps. There's 2 showers and they very very small. Husband/wife teams will likely wanna shower separately they are that small parking lot is small and trashed. Go to the king ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: The staff are excellent. Now only if we can train drivers to not leave there truck and go inside to shower eat lunch. They need to pull forward. There lucky they lock their doors or I would move it forward for them then lock the keys in the ‚Ä¶

Good morning. I went into this Pilot #390 assuming that I still have shower on my reward but it wasn‚Äôt . Miss Kathleen step in and help me out , she is a nice lady with an excellent customer service. Once again thank you so much in ‚Ä¶
Nice little truck stop. Fuel is always busy. I only come to shower and fuel. It's an older pilot so everything is old/used. But I'm thankful I even get to shower.

We run as a team and deliver to Hermiston monthly. Usually find a parking space to catch a couple of hours sleep,fuel, and a shower before delivery. Was disappointed to find no spots open, but got really angry when we found not one, but two ‚Ä¶
Nice, convenient spot. Michelle & Sharon took good care of us, quick and kind people here. Shower was clean & hot. They have hand dipped ice cream next to McDonald's ‚ò∫
Shower sink was disgusting with toothpaste and hard water stains
Stopped in for a shower. The shower was spotless with plenty of hot water. However, the public men‚Äôs room was a mess. Broken stall, water soap and paper towels all over the sink and floor.

Only gets points for having a parking spot. $15 for a shower and no points for any purchases in the store. Only reward points for fuel purchases. You think you have a captive audience because of the Wal-Mart DC. Go the extra couple of miles ‚Ä¶
Loves is better they give points and free shower and free refills flying js do not.
Very friendly staff, clean shower rooms.  Restaurant was clean, great food, pleasant staff.

showerReviews.reviewText: This has stopped being a Truck Stop...it has become a local driver's drop yard.  Over the road drivers can't stop for a meal or a shower. Get your fuel and get out. Well, I didn't get a meal or my shower, but I decided to get my fuel ‚Ä¶
Not only is it cheapest fuel around... Commercial diesel. But if you get over 100 gallons you get half off in the diner and a shower!

Expect 2 hrs to get 50 gal fuel & 5 minute shower. You must literally hand them your permit to get fuel. No the 1 operable shower will not be clean even if you're the only truck there and employees standing around looking bord.
Don't shower at this location they don't clean and the towels are so thread bear they are see threw, the for issues you will have with your feet will take months to get rid of..
Need a shower and clean restrooms, no toilet paper in stall, overfill trash bin.

‚Ä¶ besides one or 2 small ones and a smaller loves which is always packed full. This one normally always has parking and has  hot food and showers. People talking about the 5 dollar deposit for shower it's because they have towels in there ‚Ä¶

10$ for parking
20$ for a dirty shower and old towels
The staff here is really rude. Please avoid this place!!!!!!!!!

Ample parking but they charge $10 to park on they janky gravel lot, 24 hour convenience store with hot food available even at night, cheap diesel, restrooms were out of service except one shower room was open for use but had no door lock. C ‚Ä¶

Worst truck stop ever been to. They have one bathroom stall. so ask the guy if they accept ambucks for a shower. he said yeah but there‚Äôs no hot water. Told him just want use the toilet to be honest. He said no I‚Äôm not opening a shower for ‚Ä¶

Stopped for a 10 hr break and needed to take a shower.....water was nice and hot.....a little too hot but  felt great after 4 days.  Plenty of hot eats and snacks here with decent drink selections.   Staff is nice as well.   Been here twice ‚Ä¶

Lady from the morning Very RUDE, reedem my AMBEST SHOWER and she Didn't want to let me shower .. just becasue $5 deposit "cash only " I didn't need their towels , she said. It was a must.. they kept my shower but didn't let me shower ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The iron skillet used to be and the menu is very limited. So the truckers can shower and use the dog park and fuel up their trucks, but I don't recommend eating there. I'm not familiar with this area so I'm not sure what other restaurants ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ 4) At the fuel counter, I witnessed a dispute over shower points because of the cruddy point system. When a driver spends over $700 on fuel and has a receipt. the clerks shouldn't argue! ‚Ä¶

Today, 10-13-24,  around 2-3pm my wife and I stopped to grab a shower, we had separate showers. (We are team drivers, and own our own company). The whole time I‚Äôm in my shower, the cleaning lady was bitching the entire time, swearing loud ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ (The hours of operation are Mon-Fri 7am to 8pm. Saturday and Sunday are closed).Starbucks, a TV room,  laundry, shower, and restrooms. The showers and restrooms are nice and clean. Also, there is a barbershop on site and a McDonald's across ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Petro they are one of the very few places around in Spokane area that you can actually pay for an absolutely fabulous shower that is private and you can take as long as you need and the water pressure is fantastic and the hot water ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is a nice Petro.  Plenty of parking, even for transporters.  My issue was with the showers.  Like most TA/Petro showers, these are generally clean and have the two towels, bath mat,  hand towels and washcloth.  Most TA/Petro locations have ‚Ä¶

I stopped to fuel and do my 10. I decided to take a shower and eat. I fuel at TA/Petro. I get a very good discount on my fuel. I enjoyed my shower. I printed off a meal voucher. They are very analytical on the west coast about wearing a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ everything you need when you are traveling. Every body that I have had the pleasure to meet very nice and friendly. The young lady who takes care of the showers Tammy very awesome to talk  with and all shower areas spotless. Thank you Keith

16$ for a shower . better get a slow jack and ball rub for that much. showers are worse than flying j or loves. dark and dingy

well it was free and clean today. just walked in and took a shower and left . awesome

Shower great, parking pretty full, no gallons water, got their last carton of milk, someone else was wanting green tea, sold out. Well got fuel, price higher than anywhere .  But rolling again.  Would like to see them keep store stocked ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Wenatchee Valley Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: It's not a real truck stop, more of a gas station with a diesel island. Just gets smaller and smaller thru the years. No shower or laundry. Two diesel islands. Dirt lot and very not maintained.
Huge overnight parking lot , clean bathroom with shower, nice ppl at the check in.

locations.showerReviewSummary: 2 shower-related reviews found. Generally Positive mentions of: shower, bathroom, clean
